Method Detail

startUp

public static IRC startUp(java.lang.String channel,
                          java.lang.String nickname,
                          java.lang.String server)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Static method to start the IRC StoryHandler.

Parameters:
channel - The channel to publish stories to.
nickname - The nickname to use to connect to IRC.
server - The server to connect to.
Returns:
The IRC StoryHandler object created.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If the underlying IRC implementation (PircBot) throws an exception.
